data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended 30Th September, 2022
data.news_body:
With reference to the captioned matter, the exchange is hereby informed that the Board of Directors of Paushak Limited at its meeting held today has inter alia approved the Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended 30th September, 2022.

We enclose herewith the Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended on 30th September, 2022 along with the Limited Review Report issued by Statutory Auditors.

The time of commencement of the Board meeting was 4:30 p.m. and the time of conclusion was 5:30 p.m.

data.caption: Disclosure On Related Party Transactions Pursuant To Regulation 23(9) Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (Listing Regulations, 2015)
data.news_body: With reference to the captioned matter, we would like to inform that pending the release of XBRL template in the new format prescribed by SEBI vide its Circular dated 22nd November, 2021 on Disclosure obligations of listed entities in relation to Related Party Transactions and based on the verbal guidance provided by the stock exchange, we enclose herewith scanned copy of disclosures on Related Party Transactions for the half year ended 31st March, 2022. We will upload the said disclosures in XBRL as and when the template is released by the stock exchange.We request you to kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Audited Results For Financial Year 2021-22
data.news_body:
The BOD of Paushak Limited at its meeting held today has inter alia:
(i) Approved the Audited Financial Results for the quarter and financial year ended 31-03-2022; &
(ii) Recommended a dividend of Rs. 12/- (120%) per Equity Share having f.v. of Rs. 10/- each, subject to approval of the Shareholders at the ensuing AGM.
We enclose herewith the following:
a)Audited Financial Results for the qtr and f.y. ended 31-03-2022 including Statement of Assets and Liabilities as at 31-03-2022 & Cash Flow Statement for the f.y. ended 31-03-2022.
b)Auditor's Report on Financial Results.
We hereby declare that the Statutory Auditors of the Company, M/s. Maloo Bhatt & Co., has issued audit report with unmodified opinion on the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the f.y. ended 31-03-2022. This declaration is given in compliance with Reg 33(3)(d) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.
The time of commencement of the Board meeting was 4:00 p.m. and the time of conclusion was 5:25 p.m.
